titleStmt.title: Barvvick bridge: or England and Scotland coupled In a sermon tending to peace and vnitie. Preached before the King at Saint Andrewes in Scotland. Anno Domini. 1617. Iulij 13. By Robert Wilkinson Dr. in Diuinitie, and chaplaine to his Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, Dr. in Divinity.

titleStmt.title: Barvvick bridge: or England and Scotland coupled In a sermon tending to peace and vnitie. Preached before the King at Saint Andrewes in Scotland. Anno Domini. 1617. Iulij 13. By Robert Wilkinson Dr. in Diuinitie, and chaplaine to his Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, Dr. in Divinity.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: Running titles read: The praises of peace.
Also issued with title page cancelled as part 1 of STC 25664: Robert Wilkinson. Three sermons (1617).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.

person.persName: Barwick bridge: or England and Scotland coupled.
